data.title: Dropped Out Of Modeling, Worked In Shah Rukh's Super Hit Film, Became A Star Opposite Shahid Kapoor
data.meta_description: Many actors are heard saying that they didn't want to be actors, while there are some actors who left their field and entered the industry to become stars.
data.text:
Many actors are heard saying that they didn’t want to be actors, while there are some actors who left their field and entered the industry to become stars. Some of them have very good luck and achieve success soon. While some are able to reach this position by working hard. One such actress is Amrita Rao, who gave up her psychology degree for modeling and then went on to star in superhit films. Let us tell you about his career.

Amrita Rao started her acting career with the 2002 fantasy thriller Ab Ke Baras, which also starred Arya Babbar. She was seen in the lead role for the first time in this film. After this she also did the biopic film ‘The Legend of Bhagat Singh’ with Ajay Devgan, in which she played the role of Manewali. However, his film did not perform well.

Movies with Shahid Kapoor

After this she appeared in her first film ‘Ishq-Vishq’ opposite Shahid Kapoor in 2003. The film turned out to be a superhit and people loved her pairing with Shahid Kapoor, after which the duo worked in the film ‘Vivaah’. In this film, she played the role of Poonam, which people still love to watch. Amrita got a lot of love from this film. People became his fans. This is one of his most popular films. Not only this, he has also worked with Shahid Kapoor in other films.

Show full judge

Amrita Rao has also done a superhit film with Shah Rukh Khan. She was opposite Shah Rukh in the 2004 film ‘Main Hoon Na’. Apart from him, this film also had Sushmita Sen and Zayed Khan in lead roles. The songs of this film are so famous that even today they are on people’s lips. Along with this, Amrita Rao has worked in many other films. Not only this, Amrita has also judged the 2009 TV show ‘Perfect Bride’. He judged the show along with Shekhar Suman and Malaika Arora.

personal life

Talking about personal life, Amrita got married in the year 2016 in a very simple way. She married RJ Anmol. After this she gave birth to son Veer in the year 2020. She revealed on her channel ‘Couple of Things’ that she spent only Rs 1.5 lakh on her wedding, including her entire wedding expenses including her outfit.

Amrita Rao Workfront

On the work front, Amrita Rao will now be seen in ‘Jolly LLB 3’ alongside Arshad Warsi and Akshay Kumar. It was seen in its first half. Now he will be seen in the third part as well. It is being said that he has already done half of the shooting for this. Saurabh Shukla played the role of a judge in both the previous films. With this, Amrita is returning to the screen after a long time.
